column1: CIO-CI-Access Team, Ministry of Defence, CIO-FOI@mod.uk

column3: Request Summary
Documentation relating to each of the approved applications to extend the service of soldiers beyond the age of 55 with the Home Service Battalions of the Royal Irish Regiment between 2005 and 2007.
Details of reported UFO sightings over New Zealand during the last decade
A briefing authored by the Chief of the Air Staff, regarding the possibility of The Royal Marines, the Ghurkhas and the Parachute Regiment becoming part of the RAF.
Access to the following document - Piece Reference: DEFE 19/146 Scope and content: Nuclear Terrorism covering dates: 01 January 1974 - 31 December 1975
A list of locations selected in tandem with the USAF as potential or confirmed dispersal sites for the launch of GL Nuclear Weapons
Full contents of the 'short study' announced in the SDSR 2010 that resulted in the decision to retain HMS Ocean rather than HMS Illustrious in service to provide the landing platform.
Information relating to the trials of the various Ridgeback variants, which were due to begin in October 2009.
Information on public safety issues relating to continued MOD use of the Southampton Eastern Docks Operational Berth.
Details of charges made to occupants of MODern Housing Solutions housing for damage in each financial year since 1997.
Daily Opsums in Northern Ireland for 12 - 14 Nov and 4 - 7 Dec 71.
At Senior Civil Service and Band B levels, how many MOD civilian staff have formal home-working arrangements; i.e. could be described as home-workers for most or all of their conditioned hours?
Information that relates to an application made to the MOD on the 16th January 2011for registration and access to the Defence News Imagery website.
Aerial photographs of the coastline of the County Durham region taken prior to 1960, possibly during the Second World War.
The manufacturing specification the RAF lightweight boot,  outlining the parts and processes to be used.

What is the annual running costs of Southampton University Air Squadron?
What was the cost to the taxpayer of running RAF Odiham families day in 2010?
Information about how the MOD is taking forward the recommendations of the Haddon Cave Review in the context of the MOD nuclear propulsion and weapon programmes.

Information on the connections a specified individual has with the  Armed Forces and how they came to hold such a prestige role at the SPVA.
Information on whether the department or any of its agencies give pseudonymous names to staff

All documents relating to Operation Photoflash
Information on the trip to Washington USA made last year by the MOD's Head of the Defence Fuels Group along with her husband, at the invitation of BP.
A copy of the JIC report on the IRA in Eire. The references on the national archives website are: Piece reference: DEFE 31/157
